description_txt: stated on July 10, 2012 in a radio interview:
quote_txt: The new 21st State Senate district was "created in secret for Van Wanggaard. It was drawn within half a block of his house."

description_txt: stated on July 23, 2012 in a news conference:
quote_txt: "We created as many jobs in the first six months of this year as we did in all of 2011 and 2011 was the best single year for private-sector job growth since the year 2000."

description_txt: stated on July 25, 2012 in an advertisement:
quote_txt: "Thousands (in China) owe their jobs to Mitt Romney's companies."

description_txt: stated on July 24, 2012 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: Says Mitt Romney "backed a bill that outlaws all abortions, even in cases of rape and incest."

description_txt: stated on July 25, 2012 in a mailer:
quote_txt: Says Barack Obama "counted on Sandy Adams" to approve stimulus spending.

description_txt: stated on July 22, 2012 in an interview on "Face the Nation":
quote_txt: "There's a loophole where you can sell guns without a background check … 40 percent of guns are sold that way" at gun shows and over the Internet.

description_txt: stated on July 22, 2012 in a robocall:
quote_txt: "This year in Congress (Connie Mack IV) has missed almost half of his votes."

description_txt: stated on July 10, 2012 in an interview:
quote_txt: "Obamacare" is the "biggest tax increase in American history."

description_txt: stated on July 24, 2012 in a chain email:
quote_txt: The health care law includes "a 3.8% sales tax" on "all real estate transactions."

description_txt: stated on July 10, 2012 in a chain e-mail:
quote_txt: Says President Barack Obama "doubled the national debt, which had taken more than two centuries to accumulate, in one year."

description_txt: stated on July 17, 2012 in news conference:
quote_txt: The state of Georgia has lost 200,000 total jobs and 50,000 construction jobs since May 2007.

description_txt: stated on July 19, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: "When Josh Mandel claims to have accepted three debates with Sen. Sherrod Brown, he is lying. He has accepted ZERO proposed debates."

description_txt: stated on July 23, 2012 in an advertisement:
quote_txt: "Gov. Romney's plan would cut taxes for the folks at the very top."

description_txt: stated on July 15, 2012 in an interview with Fox News.:
quote_txt: Says Texas proved in court that more than 200 dead people voted in the latest Texas election.

description_txt: stated on July 14, 2012 in a political flier:
quote_txt: Says Michael Cargill was "arrested and incarcerated in Bell County."

description_txt: stated on June 28, 2012 in in an interview with The Commercial Appeal.:
quote_txt: Gov. Bill Haslam is "making our Economic Development department Sharia compliant" by hiring a woman "who specializes in Sharia compliance. That’s what her job is."

description_txt: stated on July 12, 2012 in a forum hosted by The Atlanta Journal-Constitution:
quote_txt: A proposed tax to fund transportation projects would spend $90,000 to take a single vehicle off the road during the morning and afternoon commute.

description_txt: stated on July 21, 2012 in a post on the Internet:
quote_txt: "USA is #1 in gun violence."

description_txt: stated on July 18, 2012 in a campaign commercial:
quote_txt: Stimulus dollars paid for "windmills from China."

description_txt: stated on July 21, 2012 in on the Internet:
quote_txt: "Nearly 100,000 people get shot every year. That's 270 people a day and 87 dead."

description_txt: stated on June 28, 2012 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says "Obamacare" is "the largest middle-class tax increase in history."

description_txt: stated on July 9, 2012 in a speech at the Brookings Institution:
quote_txt: "I used my line-item veto authority to veto $360 million dollars in special interest spending, so that our budget this year ... is still smaller than the fiscal year 2008 and 2009 budgets signed by my predecessor."

description_txt: stated on July 16, 2012 in a statement during a candidates forum at Nashua City Hall:
quote_txt: Says New Hampshire has the third-highest property tax in the country.

description_txt: stated on July 2, 2012 in in a radio debate:
quote_txt: The U.S. initially had three federal felonies: treason, piracy, and counterfeiting securities and money.

description_txt: stated on July 12, 2012 in an interview:
quote_txt: The Pasco County budget "has doubled in the past three years."

description_txt: stated on July 18, 2012 in an interview on C-SPAN’s Washington Journal:
quote_txt: Says President Barack Obama "has not raised taxes."

description_txt: stated on July 4, 2012 in an email newsletter.:
quote_txt: "Obamacare" represents "the largest tax increase in the history of the world."

description_txt: stated on June 14, 2012 in a letter to policy holders:
quote_txt: "Rhode Islanders pay among the highest auto repair bills in the nation."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • July 22, 2012

description_txt: stated on July 20, 2012 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: Says Jim Frishe wanted to "tax us for doing our taxes" through an accountant.

description_txt: stated on June 26, 2012 in a fundraising email:
quote_txt: Says he could be "the first president in modern history to be outspent."
